meanings.definition: The territory ruled by an archduke.
meanings.sent1: The archduchies were vast lands with many villages and castles.
meanings.sent2: The archduchies were known for their beautiful landscapes and rich history.
meanings.sent3: The archduchies had a friendly competition to see who could grow the tallest sunflower.
meanings.sent4: The archduchies stood like mighty fortresses against the changing tides of time.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the archduchies felt like stepping into a fairy tale kingdom.

meanings.definition: The title or rank of an archduke.
meanings.sent1: He was honored with the archduchies for his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent2: The archduchies were passed down through generations of the royal family.
meanings.sent3: The archduchies title came with a golden crown and a velvet robe.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom, the archduchies were symbols of power and authority.
meanings.sent5: Receiving the archduchies was a moment of great pride and responsibility.
